website_summaries.verdict: The 1More Triple Driver is a great-sounding in-ear headphone for its relatively modest price point.
pros: The terrific-sounding 1More Triple Driver is attractively designed, with nicely finished aluminum ear pieces and a Kevlar-reinforced cable
It has a three-button inline remote and microphone that's compatible with both Android and iOS devices, comes with a variety of eartips, and includes a nice carrying case
cons: You can lose the tight seal if you're walking around (not the best headphone for more active users)

website_summaries.verdict: The affordable 1More Triple Driver In-Ear Headphones sound, look, and feel fantastic.
pros: Crisp, rich, balanced audio performance that will appeal to purists
Ships with a multitude of eartip options and other quality accessories
cons: The highs might be boosted slightly more than some will prefer

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones under £100!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I don't have to mess around with my Shure SE215's when putting them on, these are just simple plug in your ear and play. No wonder they're the best earphones under £100. They sound way better than my Shure SE215's. 10/10 would recommend. EDIT: Honestly, you won't be disappointed with the sound quality of these earphones. I am picky when it comes to earphones and I can say that these definitely pass my expectations, if not, exceed it. Triple drivers ( 2 armatures and 1 dynamic driver) are amazing and you'll definitely hear the difference if you're coming from a single driver.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Fabulously full and detailed sound. 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent in ear head phones, the sound is incredibly full and detailed. Orchestral stuff is amazing. I bought them with a Dragonfly Red DAC and i have to say, that they sound so good, it is barely noticeable when used without the DAC. I really enjoy listening to music and have a high end system at home ( MBL) and wanted something for travel. These really fit the bill. Build quality looks excellent, however i am concerned by by some of the comments below, and that has stopped me buying a second pair until i have had these a few months. I will update this comment in a few months if i have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great sound and build quality. Bass is nice and heavy, sound is very clear and hits the notes right. Comes in very premium packaging with a hard case to carry the headphones. Very very impressed! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: I'm sorry but...
customer_reviews.text: ...what a disappointment these were after reading the reviews! In the first hour of playing the charachter changed from tightish to flabby and unengaging. I was just using my phone at normal levels - nothing fancy. I use Qobuz, so was llistening in CD-quality. I think the whole sound is muddy and veiled. Bass is deepish but accurate? Certainly not. "Blobby" comes to mind - all over the place. Maybe I had some bad ones? They were most definitely faulty in some way.
customer_reviews.author: Frits Hoen

customer_reviews.title: 1MORE Triple Driver In-Ear Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent in ear headphones, great bass,mid and treble,very clean and detailed, well made and comfortable with a large selection of tips for best sound to your ears. Three sets of foam..11-13-14.5mm which I found to be not very good sound wise, and six sets of silicone tips from 10mm to 14.5 which provided a better fit and sound. The supplied contents box is brilliant containing a leather carrying case,airline adapter,lapel cable clip, and earphones. IMORE also sell a Quad driver earphone which is £100 extra but to my mind the extra speaker would not sound £100 better. Very happy to recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: paddyoreilly

customer_reviews.title: Nice ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Good quality in ear buds. Bought by watching review on YT. Well they are good quality, nice music quality, but after using my AKG in-ear buds I needed time to get used to this ones. Because on the begining was strange to listen music or use for gaming. Bought these as universal buds to listen sometimes music and for gaming. Well the tripple drivers does good job, but need time to get used to them. Good mic. Give 4 start only bacause of high price. In my opinion they a little bit above of AKG ear buds, but price way higher than AKG (I talking not about chinese copy).
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality but there is a but...
customer_reviews.text: These earphones sounded good to very good with the tips that came with the earphones. I read some review advising to use these with Comply Comfort Ts-600 tips. I was reluctant to pay for such expensive tips initially but this turned out to be a very worthwhile purchase. The Comply tips take the sound quality up but about 30%. The earphones sound amazing, deliver clear and crisp sound through the mids and uppers and a well-balanced level of bass. Extremely durable too. The wire is a little bit unwieldy. Would have been useful if 1more included some sort of a clip to help manage the long Kevlar cable.
customer_reviews.author: Mukhtar V

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor build and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Sounds from these is great, no questions there but the build quality is poor. Not long after purchasing, one of the earphones stopped working intermittently. The braided wire going from the jack to wear they split is great, after that it's flimsy and seems prone to wear, particularly just before and after the in-line controller. I contacted Amazon who quickly replaced them but did not advise me to return the originals. A few months later, after discarding the original pair, Amazon charged me for the replacement. So now I've paid for two sets of these and the second pair is showing signs of wear on the same part as the original.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect except the mic
customer_reviews.text: Class Outstanding packaging and extras Super sound stage Wipes the floor with Beats and other more expensive products Only failing and it is for me (and it's a big deal) the mic is very poor cut's out a lot if used when moving Taking calls is very easy a touch of a button The positioning of the mic is good but it bounces of everything when you move and you hear every collision with your clothing If they improve the mic with better noise cancelling then it would be completely perfect Build quality is well beyond its price placement
customer_reviews.author: LLIAM MCCARRON

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding product for an unbelievable price.
customer_reviews.text: Got these yesterday to replace my old set that had been through hell, and astounded currently. Amazing presentation in the box, and lots of choice for earbuds. Sound quality is absolutely superb, and bass definitely has oomph. Last pair of headphones I got were great as well but I didn't realise how much of a step up these would be. Took a while to get used to though as I wasn't used to it at all, but they're not overly bass heavy either. It's just there for when it's needed. And will you moaners stop complaining about the inline microphone. Sure it's plastic but it doesn't feel flimsy at all. Only time will tell how durable they are
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones shame about the accessories
customer_reviews.text: When you receive these earphones you are supplied with 8 sets of eartips unfortunately all are pretty useless .The silicon tips have a reinforcement ring in the middle which muffles the sound and the foam tips are just that foam you squeeze them to insert in to the ear and they immediately spring back plus they are too shallow to achieve a descent seal.Some memory foam tips should have been provided for £65 earphones.I am using a set of silicone tips from a set of soundmagic earphones while searching for descent foam tips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but very uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but very uncomfortable to wear, and the right earbud stopped working after just 3 months. For this price I expected more comfort and quality. Amazon also does not provide a "contact seller" option.
customer_reviews.author: sven goerlach

customer_reviews.title: Poor Build Quality...Shocking Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The headphones do sound good....that being said, the wiring came loose within a month (poor build quality). What's even worse is that 1More customer service is non-existant. My phone calls / emails were completely ignored and once I finally did get connected to someone, they simply refused to hear my case and claimed that the warranty doesn't cover this (when it specifically says 'manufacture faults' in the fine print). I genuinely feel robbed considering the price of these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Augustin Wauters

customer_reviews.title: One side broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: On arrival, the left-hand side had about half the volume of the right and would make a vibrating sound at certain frequencies. Quite a lot of reviews on here mention one side stops working. Cheap quality obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot for the price !!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones for the cost, these really do compare to some higher-end earphones in both sound and build quality. Fit nicely in the ear and are not heavy or uncomfortable when in. Mic quality is really good, have used these for both work and gaming and i can always be heard clearly. The box is really nice and professional-feeling, there was a nice leather case for the earphones as well as a splitter for planes and a large range of sized foam and silicon/rubber earbuds. I have gained a collection of high-end earphones and was afraid these would not live up to them, but these really do.
customer_reviews.author: Luke H

customer_reviews.title: Quality,quality and quality
customer_reviews.text: I had been researching in ear buds for some time. I came across this company purely by chance. When my package arrived and I opened it you could see quality. Then trying out I was blown away by quality of sound these little gems produce. When the bass kicks in you can feel the music everywhere. Some might say they are on the pricey side. To me you pay for quality. These are with out a quality personified. I highly recommend these babies.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to try.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbuds as my previous pair broke and I was in need of some new ones. The fact that I had heard good things about 1more and the reasonable price made me buy these. The sound quality of these triple drivers is really good, you can hear the highs well but they also pack some nice bass in them. Comfort is very important when it comes to earbuds and you get a variety of different sized ones to find the ones for you. The magnetic travel case is a nice touch and the earbuds themselves seem to feel of a high quality. Overall, if you're in the market for some new earbuds I would recommend you try these.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great for the price range but depends on the source and may need equalising if the source is not very flat. Had mine for over a year now and have been mainly keeping them either in their carry-box or in my pocket almost every day going to and from uni and they have no problems with them as others have mentioned that they fail after a couple of months. One complaint is that the cable gets a little tangled but is not hard to untangle, and it does crease and deform a lot so after a while it gets very wavy and makes loops. Inline mic/controller is great as it works with both iOS and Android devices.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Treat these very carefully as they are prone to break (cord & earbuds)
customer_reviews.text: Poor construction and durability for a so called premium product, all I have to say on a positive note is the sound quality is not bad the packaging is good but the documentation that comes inside is not, no explanation of all the parts included plus BS made up names for technology. I should have searched out more reviews before purchase, would not recommend these, buy cheaper more reliable robust, or spend more for a real premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pow

customer_reviews.title: Perform like a cheap pair of earphones.
customer_reviews.text: I expected something that would last and I would be able to rely on but unfortunately these earphones just performed as if they were £10 ones. The build quality is great and they look good but I had these for about 3 months and the left earphone has lost nearly all sound, it is now just very quiet. I didn't mistreat them and the issue just appeared and its not what I expect for something I've spent this much money on. I'm not one for bad reviews but they let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ward

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound quality, good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones - bought them a couple of times over the last 3-4 years. So much more depth and colour to the audio both with voice and music than your standard £30 set - worth the additional £££s for the additional sound quality. Pretty good build as well - for me at least these seem to last a little bit longer than other headphones. Personally I'm not sure it's worth doubling the price and going for the quad drivers. I can hear the difference, but I have to hunt for it.
customer_reviews.author: PSpud

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Durability is poor.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these earphones and have recommended them to friends. I used them for working and leisure. The sound quality was impressive while they worked. However the rubber close to the headphone jack has now torn and and the right earphone (with controls) has stopped working. These earphones are no longer viable. The durability sub-standard for the price. Not bothering with client support having read other comments. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mc Gauran

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound. Experiment with earbud type and size to get most of out of these.
customer_reviews.text: Clear sound. Well packaged. I initially had mixed feelings as they were uncomfortable, lacked bass and the buds had poor noise cancellation property and fell apart easily. However, you are provided with various sizes of ear bud in both silicon and rubber and after switching type and size of earbud these issues were resolved. So it is worth experimenting.
customer_reviews.author: Dr N

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with build quality of these earphones.Sound quality is pretty good with deep thumping bass. Noise cancellation function works well. These wireless earbuds look impressive and very comfortable to wear, fit into my ears well and don't fall out easily. I like the hard case which comes with it, tidy and easy to store headphones. Im very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amaz on Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrific Treble Performance
customer_reviews.text: Pro's - Nice Packaging as an initial impression before you remove the earphones from the box and throw the packaging in the corner, never to be looked at again. - Good Bass performance - Fit is above average Con's - One of the worst Mid-Mid to High Treble performance I've ever whittnessed. My prehistoric limewire Skullcandys do a better Job. If youre looking for a nice unboxing experience and a flashy look with terrible sound quality, I would go and buy earpods and avoid these. If you want to do your ears a favour, I suggest to remove 1More from consideration.
customer_reviews.author: OpenSource1

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, short life.
customer_reviews.text: Detail is very good, big soundstage. They're tuned more towards mid-treble so if you're looking for bass heavy earphones these might not be for you. Packaging is 10/10, a bunch of earbuds to choose from with foam and silicone, and quality carry case. EDIT: These did break within a year and a half, (one earbud lost sound) and cable splitting at the in line controls. Great when I had them, not sure if I'd buy again for the short life. Also be aware that the black is more of a dark purple in sunlight, very subtle but not absolute black, nothing too far from the photos though.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I don't like in ear headphones, these are the only exception, I use a Lg V20 mobile and a Oppo Find 7, it's almost audiophile. No distortion anywhere, any genre, everything feels balanced and naturally/faithfully reproduced, really!
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: My over all experience with this earphone is more than a satisfaction. Before this, I had to replace my earphones regularly because of my habit of listening to music in bed during the night. But it has still survived from my harsh usage. Most of all, it's a beautiful product. I like its sophisticated color and design, as well as its quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: E M T C

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, not the best design
customer_reviews.text: These earphones do sound great. They are bassy and clear. However, for someone like myself that struggles a small bit with earphones fitting comfortably, they don't stay in very well and after use for over half an hour start to hurt a little. The durability also isn't as good as previous similarly priced earphones I've used. Also they get tangled more than they should due to the thinner separating cable. Definitely not a bad buy for someone with more normal ears however if comfort or conforming earphones has ever been an issue for someone, I would recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Healion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality, but lacking in other areas....
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months use: Pros: - Excellent sound quality for in-ear headphones. - Good for referencing mixes/mastering. - Less ear fatigue than using beats by Dre. Cons: - Not neutral - presents more bass in mixes. - In ear tips keep falling off headphones. This is really annoying!! - Have to spend + 1 min untangling each time I get them out of my pocket. - Durable? Maybe - I managed to bent mini jack. Had to send off for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Barry McSusan

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a week BUT AMAZING sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 16 year olds birthday. Beautifully packaged and presented, amazing sound quality, everything perfect apart from the fact that the right earphone started to get warm after 5 days of use, on day 7 of approximately 4 hours of use the earphone split exposing glue. Easy contact with Amazon and was able to speak to the manufacturer so excellent communication. Suspect a manufacture issue but a huge shame because these are really good on so many levels but no good if they break so quickly. Daren't accept a replacement so have accepted a refund, however I would say that we could have been unlucky and the issue has been sorted easily.
customer_reviews.author: philip summers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These sounds clearer and crisper than a lot of high end headphones I have tried at a fraction of the price. They sound balanced, the highs are never sharp, the mids and bass are more detailed than anything else I've tried. Using the foam ear tips blocks out the world for a fully immersive experience and all the materials used in them feel very durable and premium. You get high sound quality in such a small practical package. Would strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sacha Ford-Attia

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Deluxe product. Lots of rubber sizes to choose from. Only problem I had: they kept falling out of ears. I think the shape is a bit awkward and the heaviness causes them to wiggle loose. This was with just walking or sitting on a bus. The shape prevents putting them in upside down and wrapping cable around ear (something I heard about but had never tried with earphones).
customer_reviews.author: WuWei

customer_reviews.title: Lost them, bought again-that good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these several months ago and after I lost them bought again... I'm not an audiophile but the sound is better than anything I've tried up to this point(excluding expensive over ear headphones) I use them for 1-2h every single day and am completely satisfied. One piece of advice :use the provided foam tips and when they wear out buy new ones-the experience is waaay better with foam tips. The one negative about these headphones is that the mic isn't the best when it comes to hands free calls-sometimes people say my voice sounds a little distorted if in a noisy environment.
customer_reviews.author: S.kostov

customer_reviews.title: Just phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Best in ear headphones I've ever had the pleasure of owning. The bass response is unbelievable, so for those who like a thump, couple these with a good EQ on your phone and you are good to go. Amazing for a commute, and as others will say this is probably the best u boxing experience I've had for any tech product. Truly 5stars. You will hear elements of songs that you've never heard before. You will honestly be blown away by these even if you aren't an audiophile. Just save yourself the hassle and buy them
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Only built to last for warranty duration
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were fine until a few days ago, where the left earphone had a noticeable drop in volume. Did some testing and the difference between the right and left earphone was 26db! Of course, this issue happened 3 days after the warranty expired so no chance of repair from 1more. Another product only built to last for warranty duration. Best to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound, cable noise a bit much when jogging
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, cable noise a bit much when jogging, and the main reason for -1* is the excessive packaging. Too much guys. I'd prefer fully recyclable and also much less of it. The packaging is very attractive, but I found it unnecessary and a bit disappointing that I am causing that waste.
customer_reviews.author: M. Palmos

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound and fit, bad noise insulation, only package is great
customer_reviews.text: At first they seemed pretty good, well packed, and sound balanced, mids with a great quality, keeping characteristics even with high volumes. But other than nice mids, bas, hights were really missing, and when it turned out the microphone does not work properly on Android during conversion and that noise insulation was next to none in loud environments I swapped them with Sennheiser Momentum 2.0.. These were like effortless, super detailed and 1MORE, compared side by side, just sound and fit terribly bad. These headphones are nowhere near a 'monitor' headphones, really stay away is my advise.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ME..
customer_reviews.text: Too much bottom end, no mids and painful highs. Very surprised as the review sites rate them highly. Burnt them in for about 20hrs so can't go there, they just weren't for me so I returned them. You might love them so the website reviews should make you want to buy and try. Quentin
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Quentin A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality - and if you can find the right fit then they're great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality all round and a decent sound when you get a good seal. Lots of different sized plugs supplied in the very high quality case (and packaging). This would be 5 stars if I could have found a size that worked for me - but I couldn't. I have to twist them in to get a seal and after a while of listening my ears were sore.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Two years and still working!
customer_reviews.text: I am quite hard on headphones. I looked specifically for a pair that sold itself as being quite tough. I cycle to work 12 miles each way and use these in all weathers and have for nearly two years now. They still work! The buttons didn't last that long but the amount of expensive and cheap headphones that just don't last very long with heavy use and exposure to sweat and water, well I've been through a few sets before finding these. Actually considering buying another set soon on the basis of how long they've lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have lots of rubber tips to get a good fit and the fabric covered cable is a huge improvement over plain plastic ones. Controls don't seem to work immediately after waking the iDevice and the volume adjustment is a bit erratic. But decent sound, which is the main thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Andy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got my order delivered very quickly and the earphone's wire appears to be having a fold which looks like it could break off. So returning it and I am ordering a new one as replacement, I was given options to get cash back to my bank account or Amazon wallet, but I like this product so I am buying it. Apart from that this, the look and feel of it feel premium for the price I paid, total worth of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ajoy

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal sound, amazing quality at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: I already own high end Sennheiser and Bose earphones but came across an article praising these earphones. I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered them, as I has never heard of this brand before. However, at the price offered, I thought it was worth checking out. I'm glad I did. The earphones are beautifully packaged and come complete with several choices/sizes of interchangeable earbuds, as well as a really great case to store and carry these when travelling. I also really appreciate the fact that these earphones are equipped with very robust tangle free leads, Last, but certainly not least, the sound is phenomenal!! Love them and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones, but I'm not sure if they're good ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones, but I'm not sure if they're good enough to warrant the £70 price tag. Hopefully they won't end up falling apart after a few months of use, as a few other reviewers' pairs have. These are definitely headphones you'll want to keep in the protective pouch that comes with them, and not stuffed in your jeans pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Good for those who struggle with hearing loss
customer_reviews.text: I have bilateral hearing loss and have struggled for years to find earphones that allow enough sound through. I was upset to have wasted £80 on AFTERSHOKZ bone conduction headphones (due to my particular hearing loss, bone conduction is the best way for me to hear..) Not only where they rubbish, the customer service was just as bad! I was concerned that these might not work either, but was pleasantly surprised! I can highly recommend these for anyone who struggles with their hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Ms L Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality (not as good as some quad drivers but at the price it’s excellent). Cables are tough and don’t tangle much. The earbuds fit well and stay in my ears (so some passive noise cancellation). At the price I’d highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew UK

customer_reviews.title: Superb earphones!
customer_reviews.text: I am not much of a fan of bluetooth earphones and have been looking out for wired earphones. After looking through multiple products, I shortlisted this one and it's worth every penny. I like the quality and the sound effects. And having different buds adds cherry on the cake, satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rahul

customer_reviews.title: Great product and superb customer service
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are the best that our family has bought at this price range and are as good as some much more expensive models. They are comfortable to wear, come with a large range of rubber earpieces and the sound quality is top-notch. Also, my son's pair stopped working after about 6 months, probably due to him mistreating them, and the vendor immediately sent a replacements. Wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.author: Russell C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Ear Buds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones wondering if they would be worth the price!? Sort Answer.. Yes! I'm no sound expert but its obvious enough to me that these have been designed by just that. They are better used with a device that has a good output .. I have a small mp3 player that they dont sound as good as using them on my Samsung S9+. But if you want a set of wired ear bud headphones I can highly recommend these 1More Triple Driver headphones.
customer_reviews.author: John Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these earphones (the first pair being the Lightning connector version) and they are excellent! The sound quality is truly incredible and especially at this price! I would say that it is important to make sure you have a snug fit earphone tip to ensure that the bass comes through properly like all earphones and I have found that t they really come to life when adding memory foam tips that got can but separately.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: ear tips
customer_reviews.text: the ear phones come with several different size ear tips when trying to buy spar 1more replacement ear tips they are only advertised as small medium & large supplied ones that came with the ear phones are given in 8 different sizes in millimetres when contacting customer services via amazon as to the relevance of sizing to the different sizing method they didn't even now which model I was talking about even though its the only quad drive they sell . Will buy third party replacement tip now & even the earphones sound great I will not buy this make again due to bad customer service. Roger Bardelli Sheffield UK
customer_reviews.author: roger b.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, non-existent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son as a special present, and he really liked the sound quality and comfort. However, they appear to have pretty much non-existent customer service for anyone outside China, which is bizarre for a company aiming to be a premium brand. So either roll the dice that nothing ever goes wrong, or go for a brand that can match the quality and actually help you if there are any problems.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: OK.  Does not play well with music players
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is amazing. So we'll thought out. Will blow your mind. Array of bud tips. Sound is reasonable. There is much better still though. Admittedly, you have to pay more for them. Remote buttons don't work on normal mp3 players, only on phones. That was kind of annoying. Wish it was made clearer before I bought it to work with my Sony mp3 Walkman
customer_reviews.author: Magpie

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: I've had the quad drivers for a few months now. These things, when driven with a high quality source (they need serious ooomoh). I use an ak70 mk2 and it's a spectacular duo. They sound fantastic. In every way. I have many higher priced headphones and earphones and I find myself reaching for these over any. Just buy them and try them and love them
customer_reviews.author: Iain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: 1 more triple driver. Deleivered next day. Durability is excellent. Using them with lg g7 thinq and oh my God, music gone to the next world. If you had a hi res music device and you are looking for hi res in-ear buds, i would highly recommend this product for you. The distortion level is so less that i can listen for hours. On a low quality music device, you might not feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Akml Shah

customer_reviews.title: Get quality BUT Only lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: When these worked they were amazing - however just under a year down the line and I’ve had to replace them as they have stopped working ! Purchased a more expensive pair expecting them to last :-( Really upset they are broken !
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace my HTC Hi Res earphones. My preference is generally heavy bass to listen to heavy metal music. According to reviews these are meant to be bass heavy but I have not found this to be the case. I don't know if I received a defective unit. Whenever there was a bass drop in the music I listened to the earphones seemed to struggle and crackle. They seemed very boring to listen without any EQ and even with EQ the mids and treble seemed to get overpowered when slightly tweaking the bass up.
customer_reviews.author: Mohsin

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, all three buttons work on my Android phone. Never spent that much before on earphones but those do sound really nice, I can even hear some bass but as bass maniac I would want more! The cables don't tangle up much, the dust picking ins not bad either. If only I bothered carrying some super-duper DAC so I can make those even more alive...
customer_reviews.author: LukaszX

customer_reviews.title: Poor value given the sound clarity
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you receive these earphones you'll realise what your money has been spent on: the case is gorgeous and elaborate, with a plethora of accessories, all of high quality. Unfortunately, where it actually matters, the quality of the sound, these earphones are lacking. The range is good, as is the balance, but the clarity is awful for the price. You can distinguish individual notes and they're fine for vocals, but it all sounds slightly muffled; forget listening to anything with strings as it sounds terrible. Can't comment on reliability as I returned them after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Simon M. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 6 months, no client support
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy, good sound, good comfort, but the microphone broke after only 6 months, and one of the ear got the volume reduced to 10% of the other 2 months later. I contacted the support, got replied that i need to send the item to Taiwan at my own charges to get it repair (sending it cost the same as the item itself...). So i suggest to avoid buying this. The price doesn't match the client care.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high quality and well presented wired earphone. Has two balanced armatures and one dynamic sound quality. Has mic and controls compatible with iOS and Android. Provides high quality surround sound and bass. Build quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar

customer_reviews.title: ... only had them for 20 mins and they are brilliant. They aren't tuned very well by default (maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for 20 mins and they are brilliant. They aren't tuned very well by default (maybe needs a burn in), but having 3 drivers it gives a great difference with a simple equalizer adjustment without compromising on clarity. Everything about them feels premium. Bit annoyed I bought em for 85 and they got discounted to 80 the next day though :D
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Well made quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and pleasant sound.Would have been happier if they had spent a lot less on the packaging and spent more on bass reproduction.These are very bass light,disappointing in that regard.Mid and treble excellent.They come with 8 sets of ear buds,4 foam and 4 rubber.
customer_reviews.author: A. Abrahams

customer_reviews.title: Not the cheapest, but definitely the best.
customer_reviews.text: I've spent some serious money on headphones over the years, Bang and Olufsen, Bose, Beats...these Triple Driver headphones are the best by a mile. Really high quality sound and a lot of nice touches with the overall packaging...my 2 teenage boys will also be getting them for Christmas, so I'll have bought them 3 times over by then...so you can take that as a serious recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Ianb666

customer_reviews.title: Not much better than el cheapo ranges
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the freebies that came with my Berennis MP3 player these are very unimpressive considering they are supposed to be Triple drivers. Muddy unimpressive bass, very average mid range, wished I hadn't bothered at this price
customer_reviews.author: cm004d8137

customer_reviews.title: 13 Months and 125 gigs later....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in June 2018 for use as In Ear Monitors with the band I play in. Thirteen. Months and one hundred and twenty five gigs later they are still in tip-top working condition. Sound, packaging and durability have all been as advertised by the manufacturer. I have always transported them in the carry case provided and never had a single, solitary problem. A bargain at under £70 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 pairs of these earphones. On first appearance they appear good quality and the choice of ear buds ensures that you have a comfortable fit. That is the good news, the bad both pairs lost sound in one ear within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 earphone stopped playing sound before 1 year, TERRIBLE customer support
customer_reviews.text: The earphones worked well for a year, and then one stopped transmitting sound. The customer support sent a form, and so I sent a tracked package to Shepperton (which has been delivered and signed for). It has been 3 weeks, and no confirmation email of receiving the product, the warranty status or update has been given. Am waiting to hear back from both the EU and US customer support teams. I have other earphones I bought at half the price that has lasted me 3 years already - don't waste your time on this one
customer_reviews.author: J Jung

customer_reviews.title: Less than 2 months...
customer_reviews.text: Bought in march first week in may they have broken! Even toward the end of April the sound started to play up, now it is constantly bringing up Google's assistant when on youtube and turning music on/off on spotify. Sometimes only one earphone works so I have to turn input until it is just right (which is annoying if your running) For £55 not the best durability or even sound quality, the base model of beats lasted me a year!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good, BUT THEY BREAK ALL THE TIME
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, they work as intended but they are not durable, my first pair broke after a couple months, one earphone stopped having sound, and my replacement pair are doing the same. And now Amazon won't refund or issue a replacement and I instead have to go through the manufacturer which is going to be a pain. If these headphones had better durability they would be worth it. But be warned. They break easily!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kemp

customer_reviews.title: The best earbuds for vocal clarity
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I bought these in Feb 2019 and am only now posting this review 16 months later. These earbuds are simply the best for clarity when you want to hear the lyrics in a song. I have other headphones that I prefer for bass, but when I want to hear the words I switch to these and they don't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these earbuds!! It's hard for me to find something that 1. fits my ears 2. still has good sound quality 3. doesn't fall out during a workout. These do all that and more. I've used them while running/sprinting as well as weight training and didn't have to adjust them once. I was also pleasantly surprised by how long the battery life is and how quickly they charge. They also work well during phone calls and pairing with devices is super easy. I have recommended these to several people and will continue to do so in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Teddie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Top headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I can't fault these. I use them with my Astell and Kern 70 mk2 and I honestly think the headphones have done more for my listening experience than the expensive player!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Powell

customer_reviews.title: Blown my socks away
customer_reviews.text: I have owned both the 1more triple driver in ear version and over ear and i had high expectations for these quad drivers and i must confess, these... ohh man did they blast those expectations to oblivion. The sound is so rich and detailed, the base clean and punchy. I am not an audiophile by far, so other people with more experience and finer tastes than mine might disagree but these beat clean many other larger brands that are much more expensive. If you go with these you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: AVOID - SUPPORT REFUSES TO FIX FAULTY PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was fine to begin with, but as multiple others have experienced the left bud became much quieter after only 2 months of careful ownership (I always carry in the case and I take very good care of my headphones). Support refuses to respond, and you only need to spend 10 seconds looking at reviews to see that they NEVER honour their warranty. This company is breaking the law by refusing to honour their warranty, and Amazon should do something about this fraudulent promise.
customer_reviews.author: Meurig Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality earphones with beautifully clear sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality from these earphones are great, they look amazing too and comes with plenty of accessories. The packaging is top quality too, quite impressive. However as good as the sound is, they don't sound as clear, bass-y and rich as my previous Sony MDR-EX650 earphones, even though these were pricier and the Sonys lacked a driver. Overall though, I would recommend these earphones as you will still get excellent crisp sound, reliability and value for money.
customer_reviews.author: A D

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed by the sound quality ... I'm so happy with this purchase. I've been using them non-stop in the last few days and I'm truly impressed. Well made, I honestly recommend it :)
customer_reviews.author: Alin Trasnea

customer_reviews.title: Quality item for the money. Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice bass. Still need to find the right size ear bud for me to sit nicely. Plenty sizes to choose from that come in the premium quality box. I’m not convinced the wires are robust enough from where they split individually to each ear bud, but time will tell! Love the feel and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dazmeister

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I was immediately impressed with the sound quality, which is a significant step up from my previous earphones. Having purchased several highly rated in ear headphones from Onkyo and Sound Magic in the past, I am very pleased with the range of quality sound from 1More.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great in ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of headphones iv’e had from 1more. Last one were triple driver and now quad driver. Both sets have been great well packaged with lots of different size earbuds,airplane adapter and a handy pouch to keep them in. Sound quality is great with good bass mid range and treble.cable is sturdy and braided. Best in ear headphones I’ve had for the price
customer_reviews.author: ian skipper

customer_reviews.title: Great sound..
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very well packaged and come with everything you need to get you up and running straight away - various size ear fittings, a charge cable and even a quality case.Great build and fantastic sound quality with great range and rich sounds and a strong and flexible cable between headphones which won't get tangled.Using phones for commuting to work and at the gym and I'm getting almost seven hours use between charging so good battery life. Best wireless headphones I have used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great pasir of Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Tried many, hunting for that right balance of Bass and Treble and whilst I can't profess to have tried expensive Shure or others, these are superb at a price point that is hard to believe given the sound quality. Excellent. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: 1 star only because of shoddy build
customer_reviews.text: I love 1More and I've been using their triple drivers for a while. Purchased these last May and it broke after dropping it - one of the drivers is loose on the right side. Absolutely shoddy build quality for it to last less than 9 months of everyday use. To drop a pair of earphones once and have them break is frankly unacceptable. Contacted 1More for their 1 year warranty but based on previous reviews I'm not hopefully. If Amazon offers the 2 year insurance policy, I'd recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Seetoh

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value, high-fidelity earbuds
customer_reviews.text: After various attempts at alternative brand earbuds and as many deceptions, the 1More E1001 delivered what I missed out in others. From the gem-worthy package, careful product design to the clear full spectrum audio, this is a product that boasts a hard-to-beat value. I use them for listening to music as well as for calls and they meet and exceed my expectations. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Koen Van Overberghe

customer_reviews.title: Good product and value for your money
customer_reviews.text: This headset looks very cool, and I was attracted by a glance. When you get it, the packaging and texture are surprisingly good. In addition to earphones, packaging bags and earplugs of different sizes are also fully equipped. Because I have used headphones of this brand before, I have always been at ease with the sound quality of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn0717

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my Bowers & Wilkins C5 Series 2 although the base & audio clarity are not as strong. The cable also tangles very easily and it took me a little while to get used to it because the soundstage was bigger than anything that I was used to and the max volume is also limited so you might need to get an amplifier if you need a higher volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: BRILLIANT. THE TIME AND EFFORT PUT INTO EVEN THE PACKAGING IS AMAZING. THEN THE EAR PIECES THEMSELVES ARE A WORK OF ART. GREAT SOUND. CANNOT PRAISE THEM ENOUGH. YOU WILL NOT BE DISSAPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: graham

customer_reviews.title: 1More Quad in ear phones - stunning sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is outstanding with crystal clear treble and good bass. I found that the 3.5mm jack to my IPhone was causing interference and non- functioning in line volume control. I suspected the cheap adapter was the issue. I ordered a genuine adapter direct from Apple and problem solved. It is really important to choose the correct ear bud size as the buds need to fit into the ear properly otherwise the sound quality is lessened. The best in ear phones I have ever used and best value for quality.
customer_reviews.author: SW Londoner

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality, excellent customer service, durable.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these earphones is truly incredible, it is amazing and with custom tips it brings it to the next level. I have had problems in the past with the durability of the earphones, them becoming disfunctional after they suffered nearly a year of abuse, however the customer service is excellent and a replacement was sent to me. I am very impressed with this product as well as the customer service they provide. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and easy to use earphones
customer_reviews.text: I like how this earphones is really good quality and is easy to use. Its small and easy to travel with and also comfortable to wear while moving around. The connection is good and generally its been really useful.
customer_reviews.author: ROKSEAL

customer_reviews.title: Lacking in durability
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with these earphones up until recently when the right earphone has failed on me after only 8/9 months. The earbuds supplied with the earphones are not great in my opinion and none of them were a good enough fit to avoid falling out as I was walking. Once I bought some replacement foam ear buds then the fit was perfect. I really like the design on these with the in line controls too. Main drawback was the durability though so ultimately wouldn't recommend these as I think spending this much for a 9 month pair isn't great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, and great design.
customer_reviews.text: Originally loved the look and design of these. When you open the box they ooze quality too, feeling very durable when you take them out of the box.I cannot fault them for sound quality or comfort. I use them to watch tv, films, football and to listen to music on my iPhone, and no matter what I’m watching or listening to, the sound is amazing.They are also great for using at the gym and they have never fallen out of my ears yet. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Declan Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are broken. Purchased on Amazon in August 2017. After only 2 month the volume in the left ear has dropped and they are now unusable...have check, but there is no damage or reason. I need a replacement!! Great sound but now unusable. Please contact me.
customer_reviews.author: James Moss

customer_reviews.title: Liked them and wanted to keep them, but didn’t
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the money. Fully recommended. However, some reviews mentioned the diameter of the bud is quite large and possibly uncomfortable for some people.. I now know that I am one of them. Simply too painful to use. A real shame as I really liked everything else about them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Pete

customer_reviews.title: Very very good. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound quality. Really loud, crisp and unbelievably clear. Don't think they are supposed to be noise cancelling but they still cut out a good deal of outside sound. Only negative for me is built in volume control buttons, they are quite temperamental and there's a delay between pressing and actually working. Not a great deal breaker for me though, still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OliverHeed

customer_reviews.title: You’re paying for it’s packaging - very poor sound quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are very poor in sound quality. Don’t get me wrong; they look good, and the packaging is amazing and very professional. But they’re not even as good as some Betron DC950’s I got for £10! No way near worth the price, you are definitely paying the very good presentation of this product. Get the Betron’s, they’re way better.
customer_reviews.author: T. STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: One of the best wired earphones still. Hi Res sound and THX certified. Superb sound and comfort and no surprise they still appear in audio sites' top earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Graham S.

customer_reviews.title: Average Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very fancy packaging houses very average earphones. These are the most expensive earphones I have to date, and are sonically no better than some cheaper ones i have. They look nice and well made, but the sound to me is more important than how they look.
customer_reviews.author: JohnCC

customer_reviews.title: After spending a year looking for the perfect earphones (complete waste of my life)
customer_reviews.text: After spending a year looking for the perfect earphones (complete waste of my life). I finally decided that these were the best choice. Absolutely superb. The balance is almost perfect. I always find that earphones at this price range or lower struggle on the mid range and are very bass heavy. Getting a triple driver for this price is a steal aswell. You wont regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: RBetterham

product_meta.title: 1MORE Triple Driver In-Ear Earphones Hi-Res Headphones with High Resolution, Bass Driven Sound, MEMS Mic, In-Line Remote, High Fidelity for Smartphones/PC/Tablet - E1001 Gold
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Triple Driver Gold| Colour Name:Gold

As the world's first THX accredited headphones, 1MORE Triple Driver headphones are delighted by music lovers for the vibrant human vocals and clear instrumental audio combined with remarkably balanced sound.

Driven by one bass driver consisting of 'PET + aerospace metal layer + PET' design, a double-tweeter unit protected by durable silicon covers and two metal resonant cavities, these pairs belch out shocking sound with no distortion but high fidelity sound even during sudden volume-up.

Highlights:

* Balanced sound for full range - highs, mids and bass.

* Extended highs with high resolution for layered instrumental audio.

* Warm mids highlight human voice.

* Bass driven with enough impact and extension.

* Great for pop music, blues, jazz, orchestral music and folk songs.

* Work in excellent harmony with gentle female voice. For best performances hi fidelity lossless music files (>20 MB per song ) lossless music formats include APE and FLAC.



MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION
 




Warm and Balanced Sound Deep and warm bass never blows you away. The mid-range is lush to highlight human voice and the high is crisp for each instrumental layer. Bring you high-fidelity sound for your Billboard 100 Songs and rare beauty of orchestral music. A perfect tonal balance is ensured by Luca Bignardi - Grammys winner.

Triple Drivers Natural combination of one dynamic driver with two balanced armatures brings soft and warm musicality. Aerospace-grade metal in diaphragm extends high frequency to 40,000 Hz; dual PET diaphragm layers with double resonators give you shocking and powerful sound effects.




Reinforced Cable Braided cable wire with TPE is pliable, flexible and tangle-free, with Kevlar fibre inside to withstand rough pull and drag. 

Finest Craftsmanship Aluminum alloy body shimmering and glittering for a luxury and modern sense with patented CD-texture carving, sandblasting and diamond-cutting techniques. Sleek surface is fingerprint-resistant.

iOS and Android In-line remote with 3.5 mm plug for optimal compatibility with most smartphones (both iOS and Android), laptops, MP3 players, PC and tablets. Control playback and phone calls just after plugging in.




The Best Headphones Under $100 “The Best In-Ear Headphones Under $100” – Picky Ears 




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Studio Level Sound

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We want to energize your ears with true-to-life sound under $100, with stylish design and ergonomic comfort to level up your listening experience. 

What makes your product special?

As the world’s first THX accredited earphones, 1MORE Triple Driver delivers Hi-Res audio using one woofer unit, double treble units and dual resonators.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Listen from our customers in their reviews and feedback and know how satisfied they are after experiencing our Triple Driver earphones.



BOX CONTAINS
In-ear triple driver headphones 6 sets of silicone ear tip sizes 3 sets of foam ear tip sizes Magnetic clasping traveling case Attractive storage case Quality dual prong airline adapter Matching shirt clip

See more
feature_bullets: Pairs a dynamic driver (subwoofer) with dual balanced armatures (treble units) and double resonators for pronounced highs & bass with full sonority.
Low distortion but high resolution with two balanced armatures. Hi-Res attested and silicon covers protected to make every sound detail clearly audible.
Patented "triple-layered" design in dynamic drivers with dual PET layers and inner aerospace metal layer for clear human voice.
Humanized in-line control design combined with ergonomically optimized earbuds for convenient and fatigue-free listening.
Precise tuning and pitch by Grammys awarded sound engineer, Luca Bignardi, to energize and warm your ears.
